page.title: 11Forstal farm
page.content: Forstal Farm is one of the few farms around here which is not owned by Wye College. It is owned by Mr and Mrs Long. The farmwife, Mrs Long, leads quite a hard life. She works for about twelve hours a day. She is especially busy in the Spring as most of their farm is given over to sheep and she has to keep checking that the sheep are alright. When we walked over the farm with her we helped to bring a new lamb into the world. I(Katie) put my foot on the sheep's neck while Mrs Long put her hand up the sheeps bottom and pulled out the lamb. Often the lambs get tangled up in the electric fence, we found one and its leg was injured and now it will have to be a sock lamb because its mother doesnt want it.
